definition: (sports) a return made with the palm of the hand facing the direction of the stroke (as in tennis or badminton or squash), racket strokes made with the palm facing the direction of the stroke
details:
noun
- (sports) a return made with the palm of the hand facing the direction of the stroke (as in tennis or badminton or squash)
= synonyms: forehand stroke, forehand shot
adjective
- racket strokes made with the palm facing the direction of the stroke
= example: racket strokes made with the palm facing the direction of the stroke
= synonyms: forehanded
